name: Pioneering in Web3 as a Multi-Disciplinary Artist with Mark de Clive-Lowe - W3CS S1.E6

metadata.name: Pioneering in Web3 as a Multi-Disciplinary Artist with Mark de Clive-Lowe - W3CS S1.E6 1/25
metadata.description:
The Web3 Creator Show Season 1 Episode 6 welcomes Mark de Clive-Lowe, an alt-jazz, electronic musician who has released more than 20 albums over his two decade-plus career touring internationally and collaborating with pinnacle artists from the worlds of jazz, house music, dj culture and experimental music. He is a co-founder of Everwave - a music collaboration platform and DAO built on Solana; and founder of Mashibeats - a creator community at the intersection of jazz, electronica and web3. Since early 2020 MdCL has been pioneering again, this time in the web3/crypto space with the first audio-visual album on the blockchain, a paradigm shifting Ethereum crowdfund to $BUYBACK his back catalog albums from labels, and community building, curating and mentoring by way of the Mashibeats community.

Time Stamps:

00:00:33 Intro
00:02:02 Mark de Clive-Lowe's Background in the Music Industry
00:12:51 Digital Community Building
00:14:00 Merging Interests as an Artist in Web3
00:18:12 Blockchain Archaeology
00:22:45 No Code Tools
00:24:33 Music Kickstarter vs. Raising funds in Web3
00:29:57 Mashibeats Governance
00:34:00 The Quality of Community
00:40:09 Will Web3 Enable a Different Type of Lifestyle for Creators?
00:44:00 Building the Future for Creators
00:48:12 Rapid Fire Questions
00:53:22 Outro
